mapper.select:
select
from tb_industrial_develop_expert_ref where itemCode = #{itemcode,jdbcType=CHAR} order by itemUpdateAt desc
SELECT DISTINCT ef.TOPIC_CODE FROM tb_industrial_develop_expert_ref ef

SELECT
, f.FILE_NAME , f.FILE_PATH from tb_industrial_develop_expert_ref ef, tb_industrial_develop_topic t left join tb_culpro_file f ON f.DATA_CODE = t.itemCode WHERE ef.TOPIC_CODE = t.itemCode AND ef.TOPIC_CODE = #{topicCode} order by ef.itemUpdateAt desc

mapper.update:
update tb_industrial_develop_expert_ref
EXMAINE_STATUS = #{exmaineStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUBMIT_STATUS = #{submitStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCORE = #{score,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
itemCreateAt = #{itemcreateat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
itemUpdateAt = #{itemupdateat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
OPINION = #{opinion,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where EXPERT_CODE = #{expertCode,jdbcType=CHAR} and TOPIC_CODE = #{topicCode,jdbcType=CHAR}

update tb_industrial_develop_expert_ref set EXPERT_CODE = #{expertCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, TOPIC_CODE = #{topicCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, EXMAINE_STATUS = #{exmaineStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUBMIT_STATUS = #{submitStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCORE = #{score,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, itemCreateAt = #{itemcreateat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, itemUpdateAt = #{itemupdateat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OPINION = #{opinion,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, where itemCode = #{itemcode,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM tb_industrial_develop_expert_ref WHERE TOPIC_CODE = #{topicCode} order by itemUpdateAt desc

SELECT
, f.FILE_NAME , f.FILE_PATH from tb_industrial_develop_expert_ref ef, tb_industrial_develop_topic t left join tb_culpro_file f ON f.DATA_CODE = t.itemCode WHERE ef.TOPIC_CODE = t.itemCode AND ef.EXPERT_CODE = #{expertCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by ef.itemUpdateAt desc
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tb_industrial_develop_expert_ref WHERE EXPERT_CODE = #{expertCode,jdbcType=CHAR} AND TOPIC_CODE = #{topicCode,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM tb_industrial_develop_topic t left join tb_industrial_develop_expert_ref ef on t.itemCode=ef.TOPIC_CODE LEFT JOIN tb_industrial_develop_expert e ON ef.EXPERT_CODE = e.itemCode LEFT JOIN `user` u ON e.USER_CODE=u.itemCode LEFT JOIN tb_culpro_file f ON f.DATA_CODE = t.itemCode order by t.itemUpdateAt desc
SELECT count(*) as 'zjktsl' FROM tb_industrial_develop_expert_ref ef WHERE ef.TOPIC_CODE = #{topicCode}
